content: get ready for summer with the **torino head scarf** a quick and cute crochet bandana that s perfect for keeping your hair back in style no ponytail required this lightweight breathable head kerchief is made with soft cotton yarn making it ideal for warm weather the easy-to-follow free pattern complete with a helpful video tutorial makes this a great project for beginners and experienced crocheters alike whether you stick to a solid color or add your own twist with playful stripes this charming accessory is as fun to make as it is to wear https //christacodesign com/bandana-crochet-pattern/ https //christacodesign com/bandana-crochet-pattern/ the torino head scarf is a delightful crochet pattern perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your outfit this easy-level pattern is ideal for beginners and experienced crocheters alike the scarf is worked flat in one piece starting from the top down creating a beautiful triangle shape that drapes effortlessly around your head the pattern uses friends cotton 8/8 yarn from hobbii in a worsted weight providing a soft and comfortable feel achieve the perfect gauge of 4 stitches by 2 row in double_crochet using a 4 5mm crochet hook the torino head scarf is a versatile piece that can be worn as a kerchief scarf headwrap or headband making it a must-have addition to your crochet collection **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels worked flat in one piece from the top down versatile design can be worn in multiple ways clear written instructions photo tutorials and video tutorial included **materials needed-** yarn friends cotton 8/8 in worsted weight 70-82 yards hook 4 5mm us size 7 0 gauge 4 stitches by 2 row = 1 inches in double_crochet
